num1.title: پیشگیری و مراقبت متمایز
num1.description: لورم ایپسوم متن ساختگی با تولید سادگی نامفهوم از صنعت چاپ، و با استفاده از طراحان گرافیک است، چاپگرها و متون بلکه روزنامه و لورم ایپسوم متن ساختگی با تولید سادگی

home_search.title: Find Services by Specialty or Doctor’s Name…

statement.title: Nikan Family Statement
statement.content: Where Healing Meets Humanity At Nikan Hospitals, true care begins with a simple promise—to see every patient not just as a case, but as a precious life deserving of love, dignity and warmth. We believe that life remains endlessly beautiful, and every moment of healing is an opportunity to honor that beauty. Guided by expertise, elevated by compassion, and inspired by a relentless pursuit of excellence, we provide world-class medical services across specialized and advanced fields. Our commitment is unwavering: safe, effective, and exceptional care, delivered with respect for every individual—no matter their age, gender, faith, or background. Because at Nikan, wellbeing is not just a treatment—it’s an experience of love, kindness, comfort, and hope.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: What are the visiting hours?
faq.children_warning: Kindly respect these hours to help us maintain a peaceful and healing environment. Please note that visiting children below the age of 7 is prohibited. For special circumstances or exceptions, please contact the hospital security and reception. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
